amendment.description: To modify the calculation of fuel economy for gaseous fuel dual fueled automobiles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3251 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2153-2154) To modify the calculation of fuel economy for gaseous fuel dual fueled automobiles.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3251 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
